segments.text: Hi , can I assist you in any way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thank you . Yes , please . What I need is to handle some domestic affairs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . In what area ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I need a Deposit Certification to handle this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have this service . Have you got a deposit certificate and your passport ? I'm sorry to ask you , but your passport is very important .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , yes . Here it is . By the way , is there a handling fee ?
segments.speaker: S2
